Html:
Newbie alert.  I just started using PHPExcel this morning, so please be gentle.  :-)  I'm using PHPExcel 1.7.3c with PHP 5.2.12.

Is is possible to use the ReadFilter to filter on cell contents?  In my situation I have data with a category column, and I want to skip all category "E" rows.  It looks like ReadFilter can only filter rows and columns by number.

Thanks in advance.
